name: MTLCaptureScope
desc: An object that defines custom boundaries for a GPU frame capture.

items.name: func begin()
items.desc: Tells Metal to begin recording command information.

items.name: func end()
items.desc: Tells Metal to stop recording command information.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the capture scope.

items.name: var device: MTLDevice
items.desc: The device object from which you created the capture scope.

items.name: var commandQueue: MTLCommandQueue?
items.desc: The command queue that this capture scope uses to limit which commands are recorded.
